#summary Installation howto
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

*Requirements:* You need OS Android 1.6+ and about 150 Mb free space on external storage

Installation:
  # Download and unpack library database from [http://code.google.com/p/libraryclient/downloads/list Downloads]
  # Download images archive from [http://flibusta.net/sql/libattachedfiles.zip]
  # Put _lib.db_ and _libattachedfiles.zip_ on the root of your external storage folder (/sdcard/)
  # Download and install latest version of application from [http://code.google.com/p/libraryclient/downloads/list Downloads]
  # Run it!

PS. [http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=4101] через цю багу при інсталяції Android попереджає про доступ до Phone calls
